name: Welcome to the Cursed Bookshop (we also stock other things)
name_original: Welcome to the Cursed Bookshop (we also stock other things)
description: Your search for the Cursed Tome of Ystib has been long. Finally you have found the hidden bookshop reputed to be one of the few places with an extant copy. But can you persuade them to let you read it? Or does a fate worse than up-selling await?
